name: Captain Forever Remix
summary: Can you create the raddest spaceship? Captain Forever Remix is the spaceship builder roguelike. Voyage across the Solar System and blast apart randomly-generated enemies for spare parts. This is an officially-licensed re-imagining of the indie classic Captain Forever.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: STG
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2016年6月4日
  • 售价: ￥37
  • 开发商: Pixelsaurus Games, Future Crayon
  • 发行: Pixelsaurus Games
